column2: "/ci1 1 Oh, you made it this far? Then let's get to work clearing up this trash. Hurry up, Light."
"/ci1 2 Area cleared. Alright, you two go on ahead. I'm looking forward to hearing how you defeated Shiva."

"I was hoping we could draw them away from you, but it looks like I'll have to withdraw...
Sorry..."

"Hate to be the first one out, but...
I know you can finish this..."
"Looks like Light's out. Handling this on my own won't be easy, but I'll do my best."
